author: soispoke

following <@552133098075193354>'s prompt, here is the note on ethmagicians to motivate why we thing FOCIL is a good candidate for inclusion in Glamsterdam: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-7805-fork-choice-inclusion-lists-focil-as-a-candidate-for-glamsterdam/24342

author: nc1234
content: https://www.censorship.pics is showing a downtrend on censorship since earlier this year. I think this is due to US court's ruling to de-criminalize tornado cash, but the graph might paint a picture that the censorship problem is getting improved which is not the case. Instead this is a breathing room we have before some regulation deem a certain application illegal again. So we need to get focil included in Glamsterdam
